column2: Joe Biden's safe buffer approval floor and disapproval buffer ceiling is maintained. What now?
column5: projects.fivethirtyeight.com/… www.realclearpolitics.com/…  Along with J&J resumed we still need to wear masks and social distancing since the Covid virus won’t be 100% eradicated.  How long is it going to take for Biden’s approval to rise further?  What is a good indicator for midterms and downstate?
